channel.title: CVE Feed for Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory -- msr-safe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory -- msr-safe

item.title: CVE-2019-1010066|2024-08-05T03:07:18.278Z -- lawrence%20livermore%20national%20laboratory -- msr-safe
item.description: Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory msr-safe v1.1.0 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: An attacker could modify model specific registers. The component is: ioctl handling. The attack vector is: An attacker could exploit a bug in ioctl interface whitelist checking, in order to write to model specific registers, normally a function reserved for the root user. The fixed version is: v1.2.0.
